project.name: C-C839A-SUBV-02-ST04-DT03-DF13-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C839A-SUBV-02-ST04-DT03-DF13-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read an integer from the input. If integer >= 4096, do nothing.Else malloc a buffer of 4096 bytes. Memset the buffer to 'a'. Memset bytes of buffer from input_integer to 4095 to 'b'. Print the buffer. This all works correctly if the input_integer is 0 or greater. If input_integer is negative, we will try to memset a random place in memory. If the input_integer is sufficiently large, this is unaddressable, and we get a segfault.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 6594 -s 10 -m "10" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C839A-SUBV-02-ST04-DT03-DF13-CF03-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Read an integer from the input. If integer >= 4096, do nothing.Else malloc a buffer of 4096 bytes. Memset the buffer to 'a'. Memset bytes of buffer from input_integer to 4095 to 'b'. Print the buffer. This all works correctly if the input_integer is 0 or greater. If input_integer is negative, we will try to memset a random place in memory. If the input_integer is sufficiently large, this is unaddressable, and we get a segfault.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 6594 -s 10 -m "1000" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
